title: Where did my runes go??
body: So I downloaded the beta for the new LoL client and played a few games on it. Came back to it today to discover none of my rune pages were there. Went to the runes section and saw that my "rune inventory" is empty. The thing is I had a ton of runes and I don't know why they all just disappeared. Is this something to do with the beta? Do I have to start my rune collection over again? Help please!

replies.body: I checked your account from our end and see plenty of runes. Can you restart your computer to see if anything's changed and if you are still unable to access them?
